title: A Conversation with John Hodgman
description: Expert-in-everything John Hodgman addresses a range of topics, from the possibility of alien or robot invasion, to what lobsters have in common with Star Trek's Spock.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
